front.title: IMAP Extension for only using and returning UIDs

abstract.t: The UIDONLY extension to the Internet Message Access Protocol (RFC 3501/RFC 9051) allows clients to enable a mode in which information about mailbox changes is returned using only UIDs. Message numbers are not returned in responses, and can't be used in requests once this extension is enabled. This helps both clients and servers to reduce resource usage required for maintenance of message number to UID map.
